product_name: Sawyer Fast Fill Hydration Pack Adapter Kit
long_description: Use this Fast Fill hydration pack adapter kit with a Sawyer Squeeze water filter (sold separately) to refill your reservoir via the drinking tube. It makes refilling quick, easy and hassle free.
short_description: Use this Fast Fill hydration pack adapter kit with a Sawyer Squeeze water filter (sold separately) to refill your reservoir via the drinking tube. It makes refilling quick, easy and hassle free.
